com.maxleap

Class MLPassportManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.maxleap.MLPassportManager

  • public final class MLPassportManager
extends Object
    * This class provides the ability to manage the MLPassport.

    • Method Detail

      • signUpInBackground

        public static void signUpInBackground(MLPassport passport,
                                      SignUpCallback callback)
        Signs up a new passport. A username ,email and password must be set before calling signUp.
        Parameters:
        passport - the passport
        callback - callback.done(passport, e) is called when the signUp completes.

      • logInInBackground

        public static void logInInBackground(String loginId,
                                     String password,
                                     LogInCallback<MLPassport> callback)
        Logs in a passport with a loginId and password. On success, this saves the session to disk, so you can retrieve the currently logged in passport using MLPassport.getCurrentPassport()
        Parameters:
        loginId - The username or email to log in with.
        password - the password
        callback - callback.done(passport, e) is called when the login completes.

      • getInfoInBackground

        public static void getInfoInBackground(MLPassport passport,
                                       GetCallback<MLPassport> callback)
        Get the current passport info.
        Parameters:
        passport - the passport
        callback - callback.done(passport, e) is called when the login completes.

      • getInfoWithAppInBackground

        public static void getInfoWithAppInBackground(MLPassport passport,
                                              GetCallback<MLUser> callback)
        Get the user info with the passport in the specify application.
        Parameters:
        passport - the passport
        callback - callback.done(e) is called when the get info completes.

      • saveInBackground

        public static void saveInBackground(MLPassport passport,
                                    SaveCallback callback)
        Saves the object to the server in a background thread.
        Parameters:
        passport - the passport
        callback - callback.done(e) is called when the save completes.

      • saveInBackground

        public static void saveInBackground(MLPassport passport)
        Saves the object to the server in a background thread.
        Parameters:

      • earnCoinInBackground

        public static void earnCoinInBackground(MLPassport passport,
                                        int coin,
                                        EarnCoinCallback callback)
        Request earning coin in a background thread.
        Parameters:
        passport - the passport
        coin - the coin for adding
        callback - callback.done(int, e) is called when the save completes.

      • consumeCoinInBackground

        public static void consumeCoinInBackground(MLPassport passport,
                                           int coin,
                                           ConsumeCoinCallback callback)
        Request consuming coin in a background thread.
        Parameters:
        passport - the passport
        coin - the coin for consuming
        callback - callback.done(int, e) is called when the save completes.

      • logOutInBackground

        public static void logOutInBackground(MLPassport passport,
                                      LogOutCallback callback)
        Logs out a passport. On success, MLPassport.getCurrentPassport() will return null.
        Parameters:
        passport - the passport
        callback - callback.done(e) is called when the logOut completes.

      • linkInBackground

        public static void linkInBackground(String loginId,
                                    String password,
                                    MLUser user,
                                    SaveCallback callback)
        Link a user to the specify passport in a background thread.
        Parameters:
        loginId - the passport loginId, it can be username or email
        password - the passport password
        user - the user
        callback - callback.done( e) is called when the save completes.

      • unlinkInBackground

        public static void unlinkInBackground(MLUser user,
                                      SaveCallback callback)
        Unlink a user from its related passport in a background thread.
        Parameters:
        user - the user
        callback - callback.done( e) is called when the save completes.
